00015 #ifndef __PLAT_CLOCK_H__
00016 #define __PLAT_CLOCK_H__
00017 
00018 #if   defined(CLOCK_SPEED_2_0)
00019 #define CLOCK_SPEED      (uint32_t)2000000
00020 
00021 #define UBR0_INIT  0x22
00022 #define UBR1_INIT  0x00
00023 #define UMCTL_INIT 0xDD
00024 
00025 #elif defined(CLOCK_SPEED_3_68)
00026 #define CLOCK_SPEED      (uint32_t)3686400
00027 
00028 #define UBR0_INIT  0x40
00029 #define UBR1_INIT  0x00
00030 #define UMCTL_INIT 0x00
00031 
00032 #elif defined(CLOCK_SPEED_4_0)
00033 #define CLOCK_SPEED      (uint32_t)4000000
00034 
00035 #define UBR0_INIT  0x45
00036 #define UBR1_INIT  0x00
00037 #define UMCTL_INIT 0xAA
00038 
00039 #elif defined(CLOCK_SPEED_4_37)
00040 #define CLOCK_SPEED     (uint32_t)4377600
00041 
00042 #define UBR0_INIT  0x4C
00043 #define UBR1_INIT  0x00
00044 #define UMCTL_INIT 0x00
00045 
00046 #else
00047 #error Clock Speed Not Defined
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 
00051 
00052 #define CLOCK_SPEED_0    CLOCK_SPEED //no prescaling
00053 #define CLOCK_SPEED_8    (CLOCK_SPEED /    (uint32_t)8)
00054 #define CLOCK_SPEED_32   (CLOCK_SPEED /   (uint32_t)32)
00055 #define CLOCK_SPEED_64   (CLOCK_SPEED /   (uint32_t)64)
00056 #define CLOCK_SPEED_128  (CLOCK_SPEED /  (uint32_t)128)
00057 #define CLOCK_SPEED_256  (CLOCK_SPEED /  (uint32_t)256)
00058 #define CLOCK_SPEED_1024 (CLOCK_SPEED /  (uint32_t)1024)
00059 
00060 #define EXT_CLOCK      32768
00061 #define EXT_CLOCK_0    EXT_CLOCK //no prescaling
00062 #define EXT_CLOCK_8    (EXT_CLOCK /    8)
00063 #define EXT_CLOCK_32   (EXT_CLOCK /   32)
00064 #define EXT_CLOCK_64   (EXT_CLOCK /   64)
00065 #define EXT_CLOCK_128  (EXT_CLOCK /  128)
00066 #define EXT_CLOCK_256  (EXT_CLOCK /  256)
00067 #define EXT_CLOCK_1024 (EXT_CLOCK / 1024)
00068 
00069 #endif
